item.description:
This is very cool!  It is a high speed wind tunnel that allows you to free fall without leaving the building.  Watch this video from my trip there New Years' day. (link below as soon as I can figure out how to edit and upload the video)

Only commit to go if you will attend!

Buy this Groupon but act fast... http://www.groupon.com/deals/skyventure-new-hampshire-13?utm_campaign=UserReferral&utm_medium=email&utm_source=uu4440570

1. We will need 12 people.  Do not sign up unless you are certain you will participate.

To participate please do not be pregnant, do not have a cast, do not have had a displaced shoulder, weigh under 250 lbs.

2. Once you sign up please send me a message and let me know whether you purchased the Groupon.  This is important as I need that data to know how to book the group and the package pricing does not apply to Groupon holders as those folks already have a discounted deal..

3. Once we have 12 people signed up I will firm a time and contact each of you; you will need to call SkyVenture and book your time with a credit card.  If you have a Groupon they will not charge your credit card.  The alternative is we have 12 people for a $900 package deal, hence, only state you are going if you are willing to commit.

4. Once we have 12 people and a wait list those persons who have not responded to item #2 above may be removed from this list.  Organizing these group events where a certain headcount is necessary can be like herding cats so we really need everyone to respond.

This is a great time!

Thanks,

David

group.name: 40/50 Something Year Olds - Men & Women Social Networking

item.name: Indoor sky diving - it is VERY cool!
